title: website: scrolling doesn't work on iOS
body:
"You can't zoom.  (You "can", but then you can't scroll.)  If you don't
zoom, you can scroll, but it's oddly slow and doesn't track your finger correctly.  (At
a guess the scrolling is emulated in Javascript?)  And for me at least, if I can't zoom,
it's unreadable on that platform."
